#summary What is WordPress? Simple introduction.

WordPress is a state-of-the-art publishing platform 
with a focus on aesthetics, web standards, and usability. 
WordPress is both free and priceless at the same time.

More simply, WordPress is what you use when you want to 
work with your blogging software, not fight it.

New to blogging? [http://wordpress.org/about/ Learn more about WordPress], then 
follow the three easy steps below to start blogging 
in minutes. Or, for the ultimate in ease of use, [http://wordpress.com/signup/?ref=wordpress.org get a free blog on WordPress.com].
